Summary: Toyota is recalling certain 2023-2024 Camry and Camry Hybrid vehicles due to insufficiently welded head restraint brackets.
Consequence: Insufficiently welded head restraint brackets may not properly restrain occupants during a crash, increasing injury risk.
Remedy: Dealers will replace the 60% rear seat-back frame sub-assembly, free of charge.

Summary: Ford is recalling certain 2024 F-150 vehicles due to an incorrect fastener in the steering column lower shaft.
Consequence: Loss of steering control increases the risk of a crash.
Remedy: Dealers will replace the lower steering shaft fastener, free of charge.

Summary: Windshields may not have been properly bonded, allowing them to detach during a crash.
Consequence: A windshield that detaches during a crash increases the risk of injury.
Remedy: Dealers will remove and reinstall the windshield, free of charge.

Summary: Engines may have a misaligned cup plug, causing rapid oil leaks.
Consequence: A rapid oil leak can result in an engine stall or fire, increasing the risk of a crash.
Remedy: Dealers will inspect and replace the engine cup plug if necessary, free of charge.

Summary: Air bag warning label may be missing from the dashboard.
Consequence: Without proper restraint usage guidelines, occupants may face an increased risk of injury during a crash.
Remedy: Ford will mail owners the warning labels, free of charge.

Summary: Incorrectly assembled power steering rack may cause tire chafing and damage.
Consequence: A damaged tire can fail and increase the risk of a crash.
Remedy: Dealers will inspect and replace the power steering rack as necessary, free of charge.

Summary: Improperly manufactured steering gearbox assembly may cause difficulty steering.
Consequence: Difficulty steering can increase the risk of a crash.
Remedy: Dealers will replace the worm gear spring and add grease as necessary, free of charge.

Summary: Driver’s seat cushion frame may not have been tightened properly, causing unsecured seats.
Consequence: An unsecured driver’s seat increases the risk of injury during a crash.
Remedy: Dealers will replace the driver’s seat cushion frame, free of charge.

Summary: Seat belt warning light and chime may not activate for unbelted drivers.
Consequence: Failure to alert occupants of unbelted seat belts increases the risk of injury during a crash.
Remedy: Tesla will release an over-the-air software update.

Summary: Hood latch assembly may fail to detect an unlatched hood condition.
Consequence: An unlatched hood can fully open, obstructing the driver’s view and increasing the risk of a crash.
Remedy: Tesla has released an over-the-air software update, free of charge.

Summary: Driver’s air bag may tear during deployment.
Consequence: A torn air bag may not adequately protect an occupant in a crash, increasing the risk of injury.
Remedy: Tesla service will replace the air bag assembly, free of charge.

Summary: Circuit board failure may result in the loss of the rearview camera image.
Consequence: Loss of rearview camera image reduces rear visibility, increasing the risk of a crash.
Remedy: Tesla will release an over-the-air software update, free of charge.
